columns.Debate_ID: The unique identifier for each debate event.
columns.Date: The date when the debate takes place.
columns.Venue: The location where the debate is held.
columns.Num_of_Audience: The total number of audience members present.

debate.table_description: The table contains details about various debate events.

columns.Debate_ID: The unique identifier for each debate event.
columns.Affirmative: The identifier for the participant representing the affirmative side.
columns.Negative: The identifier for the participant representing the negative side.
columns.If_Affirmative_Win: The boolean indicating if the affirmative side won.

debate_people.table_description: The table details participants in various debate events.

columns.People_ID: The unique identifier for each person.
columns.District: The electoral district where the person is registered.
columns.Name: The full name of the person.
columns.Party: The political party affiliation of the person.
columns.Age: The age of the person in years.

people.table_description: The table contains information about individuals participating in debates.
